channel.title: Yell!
channel.description:
Okay, so me and my friend made a server and im asking your help here
my problem is- when i yell we don't have owner title.
my other problem is- i need help on how to add changeyellcolor or have hex color in yell

item.title: Yell!
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

							if (c.playerRights == 2){
								c2.sendMessage("[Admin]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}

Works for specific player names too so you can add a custom prefix.

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ohokay")){
								c2.sendMessage("[Custom]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}

May need tweaking.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell!
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

This is very basic, and simple. Go to commands.java search for “yell” or what your yell command is. And it has the rights of what peoples yell look like when they yell. You can just edit the yell codes under your owner name.

Here is a color code for your yell :

<col=97264800>OWNER YOU

That color is nice.

Good luck.

Read full topic
